name: Caravan
description: '''Caravan''' ({{langx|th|คาราวาน}}, {{RTGS|Kharawan}}), is a Thai [[folk music|folk]]-[[rock music|rock]] band that formed out of the [[History of Thailand (1932-1973)#The 1973 democracy movement|1973 democracy movement]]. It launched the ''[[phleng phuea chiwit]]'' (เพลงเพื่อชีวิต, lit. "songs for life") genre that has since been popularized by [[Carabao (band)|Carabao]].
